Params: {3: 'Fire and smoke cover the sky. Silence and death fill the air.'}
{3: 'The shouting never stops. She clenches her weapon, as it is the only way to interact with this world.'}
{3: 'She repeats the same action she has performed thousands of times, responding with the instinct she has forged with thousands of battles.'}
{3: "Unsheathes, swings, and cuts down the head of anyone in her way; unsheathes, swings, and breaks the enemy's weapon; unsheathes, swings; unsheathes, swings; unsheathes, swings..."}
{3: 'The path behind her is paved with piles of dead bodies. The world has seemingly lost all its colors but one.'}
{3: 'The filtering is a simple exercise of survival of the fittest. The end is near...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'There is no end. This is an endless cycle.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Someone seems to have said that before.'}
{3: 'She looks up again, and the finish line is at her fingertips. But how many times has she been here before?'}
{3: 'How long will this filtering last? Until there is only one person left?'}
{3: 'As she questions that, her perfect stance reveals an opening, and an unrecognizable, shadowy figure dashes toward Alpha.'}
{3: 'She cuts the shadow in half as she did many before. Still, it only makes her more anxious.'}
{3: 'What does a filtering like this leave behind? The tireless marcher gradually slows down and thinks.'}
{3: 'More and more monsters hidden in the shadows appear around her. They all look hideous as if having been abandoned by the world.'}
{3: "Alpha's blade moves slower and slower, but her mind and senses have never been sharper."}
{3: 'Like a kite wavering in the storm, she remains tied to the earth by a resilient line despite how far she has flown.'}
{3: 'Alpha does not know if continuing will take her to the actual finish line, but she is certain that this is not the path she wishes to take.'}
{3: 'As that thought appears in her mind, she feels the kite line behind her pulling her back.'}
{3: 'Alpha drives back the monsters that are trying to drag her back into the bloody path while trying to protect the fragile twine behind her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'The fate of that tower is sealed. I think the Ascension-Network will also change accordingly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'That change is what we want to take advantage of.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Why has the Ascension-Network changed? How can Luna and her make use of it?'}
{3: 'More and more questions arise, but Alpha still cannot find the answer. A key part of the truth seems to have been intentionally removed.'}
{3: 'The line behind her pulls her further and further away from the monsters. The scent of death slowly fades; behind her is the smell of pasture.'}
{3: 'Alpha feels like she is pulled through a veil before landing on a field of soft grass.'}
